election_record.label: Virginia 1799 House of Delegates, Spotsylvania County

sub_unit.name: Spotsylvania
sub_unit.note: "Fredericksburg, April 26. The election for members of Congress and of the state legislature, took place on Wednesday last throughout the state. In this district Mr. Dawson was re-elected to Congress without opposition; as were likewise Capt. John Mercer and Mr. L. Stanard to the state assembly." The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). May 2, 1799.

election_record.reference: The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA). May 2, 1799.
Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.
